title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AIOps Revolution: How iHeart slashed incident response time by 60% with Bedrock
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AIOps革命：iHeart如何利用Bedrock将事件响应时间缩短60%
abstract: When performance incidents strike entertainment businesses, downtime affects reputation and revenue. Traditional troubleshooting consumes time gathering logs and coordinating remediation. Discover how iHeartMedia transformed incident response using Amazon Bedrock to build an intelligent agent monitoring alerts from NewRelic, PagerDuty, and CloudWatch, automatically collecting diagnostics and initiating EKS remediation with minimal human intervention. We'll cover implementation approaches, remediation strategies, and building AI "memory" systems. Join us to see how this approach has slashed incident response time by 60% and is advancing the future of self-healing infrastructure.
abstract_cn: 当性能事故冲击娱乐业务时,停机会影响声誉和收入。传统故障排查需要耗费大量时间收集日志和协调修复工作。了解 iHeartMedia 如何使用 Amazon Bedrock 转变事故响应方式,构建智能代理监控来自 NewRelic、PagerDuty 和 CloudWatch 的告警,自动收集诊断信息并以最少的人工干预启动 EKS 修复。我们将介绍实施方法、修复策略以及构建 AI "记忆"系统。加入我们,了解这种方法如何将事故响应时间缩短 60%,并推动自愈基础设施的未来发展。
